title: october 31: i got 95 problems but theses ain’t one
description:
Today on 365 Days with mxmtoon, Maia goes all the way back to 1517, to the moment that started the Protestant Reformation: Martin Luther’s nailing of the 95 theses. Is the tale all that it seems? Maia investigates. Then she comes back to the present day with a story from One Direction’s recent history. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
